::Zardus/Reptilica/DevilDuer::

Zardus frowns as his computer reports a bot near Alliance territory, and a 
high power source detected on another one of the continents.

"Reptilica," he says into his comm, "Did you reach the bot yet?"

"I'm at the spot," Reptilica's voice replies, "But he ain't here, and I can't 
trace 'im."

"Allright," Zardus says, "Go to the coordinates I'm sending you. A power 
reading has been reported there, a high one."

"On my way," Reptilica's voice sounds back, the comm terminating.

Zardus opens another comm, this one to DevilDuer, about the bot in Alliance 
territory.

"DevilDuer," he says, "A bot just wandered into Alliance territory, can you 
check it out?"

Zardus looks back at Starscream, waiting for the bot to sit down.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DevilDuer rubs his hand, shrugging. "Don't worry about it," he says as he 
recieves Zardus' transmission.

"Hey, would you mind coming along with me and Hurricane somewhere?" he asks 
as he transforms into his tazmanian devil beast mode, "We gotta take care of 
something."
